extendedInfo.description: Calculate mortgage payments given principal, interest and term. Reverse calculate any one variable given the other three.Enter a down payment amount or percentage and let the calculator show how large a mortgage you require.See how the monthly payment changes when you factor in additional monthly or annual loan costs such as PMI, HOA, taxes and insurance.The calculator supports Fixed and Adjustable Rate Mortgages (ARM) loans with up to five changes in interest rates. Interest-only mortgages loans are also supported.You can pay off your mortgage early with extra payments. Add one-off, monthly and annual extra payments. Choose up to ten additional extra payment amounts and payment periods and the calculator will show how much money you can save on the loan.Choose from weekly to annual loan payments and adjust the compounding period from daily through annual periods. The calculator supports Canadian mortgages along with UK annual rest mortgages.Multiple rounding options on loan calculations are also available. Choose between no rounding, round half up, half down, to even, to ceiling and to floor.The calculator also supports the input and display of multiple currencies.Permissions:- Internet access required for adverts and analytics- External storage access required to store email attachments prior to sending

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Excellent useful app, detailed and nicely done. You guys hit a home run with this app. kudos!
reviews.author: Rafael Alsina

reviews.title: Best mortgage calc program out there
reviews.comment: Simple input gives you information every way you want to see it.
reviews.author: Frank Sturgeon

reviews.title: Battery use
reviews.comment: Great app but when force stop it still is using battery power.  Please fix, why still using battery life?
reviews.author: G Smith

reviews.title: Get this app.
reviews.comment: Top notch. Easy UI. Best feature is the ads don\'t interfere with the use of the app. This is the first app I have ever recommend. It\'s that good ...
reviews.author: sir buff

reviews.title: Not accurate
reviews.comment: Waaaaaaay off the calculations of bank calculators and does not factor in cmhc or similar mortgage insurance. Payments doubled using the same input on a bank mortgage site. Not trustworthy!! Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Jackie MacDonald

reviews.title: Very useful mortgage calculator
reviews.comment: I find this app very useful and informative. Gives full details of loan amortizations, balance, interest and principal in table and graph. Lets you edit, add in extra payments, rates and save multiple loans. This is a must have app for people who want to keep an eye on their mortgages.
reviews.author: Rex McCoy

reviews.title: Karl\'s Mortgage Calculator
reviews.comment: Great app, I use it at least once when I\'m working with buyers in real estate transactions.
reviews.author: Del Shelton

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Has all the necessary feature
reviews.author: Pat Mar

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I want to buy a house that I can pay off before I retire. This app has been invaluable in letting me realize exactly what I do and do not want to pay, how much I need to save up for a decent down payment if I want a 15 year loan, and how much I will save by going the 15 yr route as opposed to the 30.
reviews.author: Laura Wilson-Anderson

reviews.title: Wrong calculations
reviews.comment: Total payment and interest showing wrong in a 20yr term....... uninstalling.
reviews.author: Rakesh Mallick

reviews.title: Great stuff, thanks.
reviews.comment: Works well with no issues.
reviews.author: Alan Khuu

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Note2 fast great info
reviews.author: Clint Schaeffer

reviews.title: Just amazing
reviews.comment: Only thing I\'d add is a way to get current mortgage rates but that would probably make the app too bulky

reviews.title: Does everything
reviews.comment: Does everything I need. Includes expenses, charts, etc. Easy to use and enter data. Better than some of the fancy ones I tried.
reviews.author: Ian Dromey

reviews.title: Exactly what it says it is.
reviews.comment: No fluff, no mess, Great App.

reviews.title: Gr8 app
reviews.comment: I love this app I use it all the time it calculates very quick and is very user freindly

reviews.title: Exelent application.
reviews.comment: Work greate. I love it.

reviews.title: Easy to use but...

reviews.title: Works great

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Very useful. The save feature is a particularly nice touch.
